Name: Gassy Man
About the game: The free-to-play version of Gassy Man, a game in development from All Day Breakfast Productions. In Gassy Man our hero (Mike), must use his strangely noxious super power to defend the Earth from alien invaders! Use the power of your own gas to fly across the city and knock UFOs out of the sky to save humanity from extraterrestrial invasion forces. This game is in Beta and we would love to get player feedback to help make it better. Simple gameplay mechanics utilize the directional arrows. Up to fly, left and right to move or float in that direction.
